text: A draft sneaks in like a thief in the night Walls with the secret flocks shiver and fry But here he comes with a steady hand The spray foam marks men the savior of the land He's got a gun but it's not what you think It shoots out foam, seals every sink On the mark every time Cause those petals stop the climb Covered calls, he's the one The spray foam marks men gets it done Get it done Get it done You're addicts so that's what your basement's a fridge Energy's leaking like water through a bridge But he sees the gaps his aim is true With one quick shot the cold bit of dew Laser precision, no room for doubt A spray foam magic inside the door On the mark every time Cause those petals stop the climb Covered calls, he's the one The spray foam marks men gets it done The spray foam marks men gets it done Get it done

segments.text: A draft sneaks in like a thief in the night
Walls with the secret flocks shiver and fry
But here he comes with a steady hand
The spray foam marks men the savior of the land
He's got a gun but it's not what you think
It shoots out foam, seals every sink
On the mark every time
Cause those petals stop the climb
Covered calls, he's the one
The spray foam marks men gets it done
Get it done
Get it done
You're addicts so that's what your basement's a fridge
Energy's leaking like water through a bridge
But he sees the gaps his aim is true
With one quick shot the cold bit of dew
Laser precision, no room for doubt
A spray foam magic inside the door
On the mark every time
Cause those petals stop the climb
Covered calls, he's the one
The spray foam marks men gets it done
The spray foam marks men gets it done
Get it done

improved_metadata.title: The Spray Foam Marksman
improved_metadata.description: This song celebrates the unsung hero who seals drafts and insulates homes with precision using spray foam. It's a quirky ode to energy efficiency and DIY problem-solving.
improved_metadata.key_lyrics: He's got a gun but it's not what you think / It shoots out foam, seals every sink
